name: All About Brazil Quiz | Soccer | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following broke the world record transfer fee in 1997?
questions.explanation:
Ronaldo.

	Ronaldo moved from Barcelona to Inter Milan for 18 million pounds, but has been plagued by injuries once he moved to Italy.

questions.text: Which of the following broke the world record transfer fee in 1998?
questions.explanation:
Denilson.

	Real Betis paid Sao Paolo 22 million pounds for his services.

Ronaldo Luiz Nazario da Lima.

	Born in September 1976 in Rio De Janeiro, Ronaldo has played for several clubs before Barcelona and Inter:- Social Ramos Club, São Cristovão, Cruzeiro Belo Horizonte and PSV Eindhoven.

questions.text: Which of the following was the only one who was a member of the 2002 World Cup squad?
questions.explanation:
Ricardinho.

	Originally Ricardinho wasn't selected, but because of Emerson's injury, he was called up at the last minute.

questions.text: Which of the following scored in the 2002 Champions League Final?
questions.explanation:
Lucio.

	Lucio scored for Bayer Leverkusen in their 2-1 loss to Real Madrid.

questions.text: In the qualification for the 2002 World Cup, how many games did Brazil lose?
questions.explanation:
6.

	Out of the 10 countries from CONMEBOL (South America), 5 qualified for the finals (5th placed zuruguay beat the Oceania winner, Australia, in a play-off for the 32nd and final place in the Finals). Brazil came third but were fortunate to qualify with their poor away form.

questions.text: What was the nickname of the 2002 World Cup coach, Luiz Felipe Scolari?
Which player dislocated his shoulder just prior to the start of the 2002 World Cup, and was sent home?
questions.explanation:
Emerson.

	The Roma midfielder injured his shoulder while playing in goal in a training match.

questions.text: Which of these players was described as 'The new Roberto Carlos'?
questions.explanation:
Athirson.

	In 2001-02 Athirson was on loan to Flamengo from Juventus.

questions.text: Which Brazillian went on loan to Fiorentina from Inter Milan and scored six times in fifteen appearances during the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Adriano.

	Adriano signed for Parma after the end of the 2001-02 season.
